result.title: storylines on climate change induced risk of selected EU strategic partner countries
result.description: It will summarise the co-created storylines (content) on climate change induced risk to sustainable development and climate resilience of selected EU strategic partner countries and how they were developed (process). The report will be produced to enable assessing coherence of the storylines developed across the various sectors (WP3-7). It will contain the results of the desk review, consultations with societal stakeholders and the workshop held by WP5.
